name: Google Voice Dark
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
tired of straining your eyes to read your messages on Google Voice? unfortunately, Google does not yet offer theming options for the Voice page, so in the meantime... STOP THE BLINDNESS with my Google Voice Dark style which retains the minimalistic design of Google in a dark variant that is especially easy on the eyes at night. much credit goes to user 22904 for the style style 22379, from whom + which i originally borrowed most of the code. in my opinion, this style looks very good with the Calibri font, great with Google's own Roboto font + excellent with my new favorite font, Open Sans Light... i'm sure it'll look great with your favorite font(s) as well. please report any bugs you may find + feel free to drop a comment/suggestion below. enjoy! :-D ***note: the screenshot was taken in Firefox with my personal Open Sans Light font style applied
